item.description:
MARCH 17, 2010

Hi!

HAPPY ST. PATRICK'S DAY!

Hope this note finds all of you well and, given the sun shining on us, full of joy!

Just a reminder about our next INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB gathering.

Mark your calendars:

TIME: April 11th, 2010 at 4:00PM
PLACE: PEACE ABBEY - Two North Main Street, Sherborn, MA 01770 interfaith bookclub gathering...

On March 7th, we begun our reflection on THOMAS MERTON'S book: "THE INNER EXPERIENCE - Notes on contemplation". Great sharing and exchange among the four participants. We hope many more people will be able to come and join us next time.

For our April 11th gathering we are going to reflect and share on Merton's book, chapters 4 and 5 (pages 35-70).

Come and join us. I hope you can all make it. I personally continue to be enriched by your presence and by our common sharing and reflection.

See you on Sunday - April 11th, at 4:00PM.

Blessings on you and your loved ones. May the Divine in each of us empower us to be bridge makers and not obstacle makers...

PEACE
Fr. Joe, sx
St. Francis Xavier Missionaries
(508) 429-2144
pino.ma@gmail.com
item.name: UP-COMING INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB MEETING (April 11th!
